description.narrative: Development of revised Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC) on Climate Change developed and submitted to the UNFCCC, as per the requirements of the Paris Agreement.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: Revised NDC completed and submitted to the Government for adoption and official submission to the UNFCCC [1]

comment.narrative: [1] The country submitted its INDC (now NDC) in August 2015, in which the Government committed to reduce the CO2 emissions from fossil fuel combustion by 30%, and 36% at a higher level of ambition, by 2030 compared to the business as usual (BAU) scenario. The focus of the Macedonian NDC is put on climate change mitigation, that is, on policies and measures which lead to GHG emissions reduction, and particularly to CO2 emissions from fossil fuels combustion which covers almost 80% of the total GHG emissions in the country. The following sectors are of dominant share: energy supply, buildings and transport.

[a] Political will and societal ownership at national and sub-national levels strengthened [b] NDC reviewed and aligned/updated to existing targets, policies and measures [c] New sectors and/or greenhouse gases incorporated [d] Costs and investment opportunities assessed [e] Monitoring progress & transparency strengthened [f] NDC relevant Communications and learning improved

- The enhanced NDC has been developed and submitted to the Government for approval in Dec 2020. Potential mitigation activities have been analyzed, increasing Macedonian ambition to an 82% reduction in net greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions in 2030 in comparison with 1990. [a] - The enhanced NDC is fully aligned with all relevant national strategic priorities. The enhanced NDC echoes the Green scenario from the National Strategy for Energy Development up to 2040 and is fully aligned with the draft National Energy and Climate Plan [b] - The enhanced NDC focuses on mitigation and covers following GHGs: CO2, CH4, N2O [c] - Costs and investments have been analyzed foe each of the 63 climate action stipulated in the NDC. Moreover, the benefits of Circular Economy on GHG emission reduction have been analyzed with an aim to identify opportunities and challenges for the mitigation through advancing circular practices in the waste management sector, in line with the European Green Deal and the EU Action Plan on Circular Economy. Regarding the role of the private sector in the mitigation action, it participates with 85% in total investments needed for realization of the PAMs in the Industry sector. [d] - Monitoring the progress of implementation shall be incorporated in the national MRV platform (under development). All relevant information are transparently presented on the national climate change platform www.klimatskipromeni.mk [e] - All knowledge management products are available on www.klimatskipromeni.mk. NDC relevant public awareness campaign has been initiated [f]

Political will and national ownership and engagement for the NDC built through policy dialogues with the key national stakeholders on a various events int he country, in the region and on the COP26 where Macedonian President and the enhanced NDC were featured on the UNDP flagship event and in various publications and related events [g] UNFCCC and Gender Focal Points, Gender Machinery and Parliamentarian Commission on Equal Opportunities engaged to promote leadership roles for women in climate action, using innovation tool named micronarratives [h] Socio-economic impacts of NDC targets/measures assessed, indicating close positive corelation with enhanced NDC climate action and COVID recovery [i] Policy de-risking and financial de-risking assessed for all enhanced NDC sectors, in close cooperation with IRENA and UNEP DTU [j] Strategy for financing NDC implementation developed and presented widely [k] Roadmap for introduction of carbon tax in the country developed and presented widely [l] Institutional capacity assessment has been conducted to identify critical skills gaps for NDC implementation and a mid-term capacity building plan has been developed. The results of the report Climate Change Institutional Capacity Assessment have been published on the national climate change portal www.klimatskipromeni.mk [m] Enhanced NDC adopted and submitted to UNFCCC in April 2021, as most ambitious in the region [n]
